verses.name: Psalms 120:1
verses.text: In my distress I cried unto the Lord, and he heard me.

verses.name: Psalms 120:2
verses.text: Deliver my soul, O Lord, from lying lips, and from a deceitful tongue.

verses.name: Psalms 120:3
verses.text: What shall be given unto thee? or what shall be done unto thee, thou false tongue?

verses.name: Psalms 120:4
verses.text: Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.

verses.name: Psalms 120:5
verses.text: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!

verses.name: Psalms 120:6
verses.text: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace.

verses.name: Psalms 120:7
verses.text: I am for peace: but when I speak, they are for war.
